_srdData.name: Efreeti Bottle
entries: When you take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to remove the stopper of this painted brass bottle, a cloud of thick smoke flows out of it. At the end of your turn, the smoke disappears with a flash of harmless fire, and an {@creature Efreeti|XMM} appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.
The first time the bottle is opened, the DM rolls on the following table to determine what happens.

rows: The {@creature efreeti|XMM} attacks you. After fighting for 5 rounds, the efreeti disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.

The {@creature efreeti|XMM} understands your languages and obeys your commands for 1 hour, after which it returns to the bottle, and a new stopper contains it. The stopper can't be removed for 24 hours. The next two times the bottle is opened, the same effect occurs. If the bottle is opened a fourth time, the efreeti escapes and disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.
The {@creature efreeti|XMM} understands your languages and can cast {@spell Wish|XPHB} once for you. It disappears when it grants the wish or after 1 hour, and the bottle loses its magic.
